label: def-perturbation-measure
natural_language_description: For a given noise scale $\sigma > 0$, the **Perturbation Measure**, $\mathcal{P}_\sigma(x, \cdot)$, is a **Valid Noise Measure** according to Definition 2.3. It governs the random walks during the perturbation step of the algorithm.
name: Perturbation Measure
